sentence.Network_en: Suddenly there came a rat - a - tat on the door.
sentence.Network_cn: 突然传来了一阵梆梆的敲门声.

sentence.Network_en: Or a whale, a louse, a rat, a fly?
sentence.Network_cn: 或者一只鲸鱼 、 一只虱子 、 一条狗 、 或一只苍蝇又会 如何 ?

sentence.Network_en: Its main characters were a rat, a mole, and a toad.
sentence.Network_cn: 其主要特征是一只老鼠, 一痣, 和蟾蜍.

list.abs: 翻译的理论-土木在线论坛 ... 39．沸腾之声 hubble-babble 40．砰砰 rat-a-tat 41．水泄不通 chock-a-block.

means.word_mean: 1. a series of short sharp taps (as made by strokes on a drum or knocks on a door)
